content: this legal text summarizes a court case that lasted for three years the case involved a dispute between the spouses gi pi and ca and the deceased parent sa ia the court ruled that the provisions in a holographic will made by the mother of the plaintiffs were detrimental to the rightful shares of gi ca and pi ia the court ordered a reduction in the payment of a sum of money to compensate for the injury the father of the plaintiffs had transferred real estate assets from the succession of his wifes death the costs of the litigation were placed on the parties the appellants pi ca and vi ia argued that the appeal was unfounded and listed several procedural and legal defects the court analyzed each complaint and made a determination on the reduction of the payment the court ultimately ordered the appellant to pay a specific amount plus interest to the respondent and cover the costs of summoning the respondent the rest of the judgment was confirmed the decision was made on september 26 2019 in palermo

metadata.CASE_ID: Corte appello Palermo sez. II, 03/10/2019, n.1948
